tasks.instructions: Follow the first red moving car and continue in the same direction until you have passed six streetlights.
If you were a graffiti, where would you be painted?
If you were a dark cloud, who passer-by you would follow? Follow the passer-by until you see number five.
Write down adjective that describes your environment.
If sun is shining continue left, otherwise right. Walk until you see a blue house.
Walk around until you find a gateway to other dimension.
Follow the first white dog you see until see someone with a white hat.
Write down substantive that describes what you see.
Take direction towards civilization. Walk until you see your favorite traffic sign.
Let your nose lead you until you see something flying. Take a scenery photograph.
